name: moltbot-extension
description: Moltbot browser extension - Personal AI assistant powered by Claude

scripts.build: bun run build:clean && bun run build:bundle && bun run build:copy
scripts.build:bundle: bun build popup/popup.tsx options/options.tsx background.ts content.ts --outdir=dist --splitting --target=browser --minify
scripts.build:copy: cp manifest.json dist/ && mkdir -p dist/popup && cp popup/popup.html popup/popup.css dist/popup/ && mkdir -p dist/options && cp options/options.html dist/options/ && mkdir -p dist/icons && cp icons/*.svg dist/icons/ && (cp icons/*.png dist/icons/ 2>/dev/null || bun run scripts/generate-icons.js)
